test_steps.name: phi-2_decode-pergrp
test_steps.command: python run_awq.py --model_name microsoft/phi-2 --task decode --algorithm pergrp --target aie

test_steps.name: phi-3_benchmark-pergrp
test_steps.command: python run_awq.py --model_name microsoft/Phi-3-mini-4k-instruct --task benchmark --algorithm pergrp --target aie

test_steps.name: llama-2-7b-benchmark-awqplus
test_steps.command: python run_awq.py --model_name llama-2-7b --task benchmark --algorithm awqplus --target aie

test_steps.name: llama-2-7b-benchmark-awq
test_steps.command: python run_awq.py --model_name llama-2-7b --task benchmark --algorithm awq --target aie

test_steps.name: llama-2-7b-chat-benchmark-awqplus
test_steps.command: python run_awq.py --model_name llama-2-7b-chat --task benchmark --algorithm awqplus --target aie

test_steps.name: llama-2-7b-chat-benchmark-awq
test_steps.command: python run_awq.py --model_name llama-2-7b-chat --task benchmark --algorithm awq --target aie

test_steps.name: Qwen1.5-7B-Chat-awq
test_steps.command: python run_awq.py --model_name Qwen/Qwen1.5-7B-Chat --algorithm awq --task benchmark --target aie

test_steps.name: Qwen1.5-7B-Chat-awqplus
test_steps.command: python run_awq.py --model_name Qwen/Qwen1.5-7B-Chat --algorithm awqplus --task benchmark --target aie

test_steps.name: Meta-Llama-3-8B-pergrp
test_steps.command: python run_awq.py --model_name meta-llama/Meta-Llama-3-8B --algorithm pergrp --task benchmark --target aie

test_steps.name: Meta-Llama-3.1-8B-pergrp
test_steps.command: python run_awq.py --task decode --model_name NousResearch/Meta-Llama-3.1-8B --algorithm pergrp --group_size 32 --target aie

test_steps.name: Meta-Llama-3.2-1B-pergrp
test_steps.command: python run_awq.py --model_name nltpt/Llama-3.2-1B --task decode --algorithm pergrp --target aie

test_steps.name: Meta-Llama-3.2-3B-pergrp
test_steps.command: python run_awq.py --model_name nltpt/Llama-3.2-3B --task decode --algorithm pergrp --target aie
